subject: Basketball
Swine Influenza
lead_paragraph: Twenty-three of the N.B.A.’s 30 owners need to approve the purchase of a controlling stake in the team by Russian oligarch Mikhail D. Prokhorov.
snippet: Twenty-three of the N.B.A.’s 30 owners need to approve the purchase of a controlling stake in the team by Russian oligarch Mikhail D. Prokhorov.
